plot: Danmarks Radio's journalist Anni Pape reunites her 30 year-old Tvind team. The old friends and foes reflect on the dramatic period of their lives. As the team criticises Tvind Anni tries to find her old love who was also a member of Tvind.
title: Tvind, revolution og kærlighed
plot_es: Danmarks Radio's journalist Anni Pape reunites her 30 year-old Tvind team. The old friends and foes reflect on the dramatic period of their lives. As the team criticises Tvind Anni tries to find her old love who was also a member of Tvind.
plot_en: Danmarks Radio's journalist Anni Pape reunites her 30 year-old Tvind team. The old friends and foes reflect on the dramatic period of their lives. As the team criticises Tvind Anni tries to find her old love who was also a member of Tvind.
